sourceDesc:
<<<<<<< HEAD
The history of Philoxypes and Polycrite, as it was told by Leontides to the great Cyrus. / Englished out of French, by an honourable anti-Socordist. Scudéry, Madeleine de, 1607-1701.
[2], 187 p.
Printed for Humphrey Moseley, and are to be sold at his shop in St. Pauls Church-yard at the sign of the Prince's Arms, London, : 1652.
Attributed to Madeleine de Scudéry by Wing. Errors in paging: 142-143 numbered 141-142. Reproduction of original in: British Library, London, England.
=======

Printed for Humphrey Moseley, and are to be sold at his shop in St. Pauls Church-yard at the sign of the Prince's Arms, London, : 1652.
Attributed to Madeleine de Scudéry by Wing. Errors in paging: 142-143 numbered 141-142. Reproduction of original in: British Library, London, England.
